labels.name: Name
labels.linked-stores: Linked stores (customers from these stores can use their credentials to sign in)

placeholders.name: Enter name
placeholders.linked-stores: This store has no linked stores

descriptions.code: This will be used as the store's primary key, as well as a part of the URL for store selection in the Frontend Application
descriptions.name: This name will be displayed in Store Manager
descriptions.catalog: Any physical or virtual catalog associated with this store

storeNotificationsWidget.title: Notification
storeNotificationsWidget.blade-title: List of notification types for store {{id}}

store-delete.title: Confirm delete
store-delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this store?

store-save.title: Save changes
store-save.message: The store has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

tax-provider-save.title: Save changes
tax-provider-save.message: The tax provider has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

permissions.store:loginOnBehalf: Login on behalf of a customer

TaxCalculationEnabled.title: Tax calculation
TaxCalculationEnabled.description: Enable/ disable tax calculation in the Frontend Application

AllowAnonymousUsers.title: Anonymous store visits
AllowAnonymousUsers.description: Prohibit/ allow anonymous users to visit the store

IsSpa.title: Single-page application (SPA)
IsSpa.description: Specify whether this store is a single-page application

SeoLinksType.title: SEO links
SeoLinksType.description:
Determine link type for product and category. Examples:
 1. Long:  /virtual-parent-category/physical-parent-category/my-cool-category/my-cool-product,
 2. Collapsed: /virtual-parent-category/my-cool-category/my-cool-product,
 3. Short: /my-cool-product,
 4. None: /product/123

EmailVerificationEnabled.title: Email verification
EmailVerificationEnabled.description: Enable/ disable email verification for users

EmailVerificationRequired.title: Required email verification
EmailVerificationRequired.description: Enable/ disable required email verification for users

EnablePriceRoundingForTotalsCalculation.title: Price rounding for totals calculation
EnablePriceRoundingForTotalsCalculation.description: Enable/ disable price rounding in Order and Cart modules

VirtoCommerce.Store.description: Export or import stores with all related data

StoreDynamicEmailNotification.displayName: Submitting forms in the Frontend Application
StoreDynamicEmailNotification.description: The customer gets an email notification when submitting a form (e.g. the Contact Us form) in the Frontend Application
